Package com.iver.cit.gvsig.cad

Class Summary
CADUtil Utility methods to work with CAD extension
GenerateAdjacentPolygonCADTool CAD tool which generates and adjacent polygon to a given one of a edition layer by digitizing a line touching the original polygon.
GenerateAdjacentPolygonCADToolExtension  
SimplifyGeometry This extension only will active when active layer is a linear (dimension = 1) vectorial layer with selected lines.
SmoothGeometry Smooths selected geometries (with dimension 1 or 2) applying the specified curve.
SplitGeometryCADTool CAD Tool which splits the selected geometries of a vectorial editing layer with a digitized polyline.
SplitGeometryCADToolExtension CAD extension to split geometries from a digitized linear geometry.
TopologicalEditVertexCADTool CAD tool to make a topological edition (all the vertex of the affected geometries of a topology's layers will be moved simultaneusly).
TopologicalEditVertexExtension CAD Extension that edits a vertex, moving the same vertex in all the layers of a topology that shares it.
